mapper.select: select mem_id from t_member where age=27
SELECT m.mem_id , m.name , m.gender , m.age , p.say , p.img_src , p.sido , p.gungu , p.cate_one , p.cate_two , p.cate_three FROM t_member m , t_profile p WHERE m.mem_id = p.mem_id

SELECT m.name , m.mem_trust , p.cate_one , p.cate_two , p.cate_three , p.say , to_char(p.open_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') , to_char(p.close_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM t_member m , t_profile p WHERE m.mem_id = p.mem_id and name = #{name}
